comments:
On Java Perspective (I don't remember seeing that on other perspectives), if you
request the context menu when a directory/package is selected, it does not
always appear. You first need to ask for a context menu on a single file (and
get it) and then the popup menu on a directory can be asked.

Christophe,

do you have a reproducable case for this ? Anything in the log ?

Can't reproduce. Please reopen if you still see the problem and provide steps 
to reproduce.

Gasp! shame on me, I didn't look at the log which says:
